NewsArticle.Title: Server Maintenance - UPDATE
NewsArticle.Content:
On May 26th between 8:00AM-8:30AM PST, there will be a scheduled server reset. The servers will be down for about 3 hours. Thank you for your cooperation.
**The server maintenance is taking longer than expected, but we are working to minimize the downtime and hope to get the DA servers back up shortly.**
DA Team
